next.text: I'm planning to work abroad, and I wanted to hear more about traveling through a government broker.

1.text: Good morning.  How can I help you today?

10.text: Of course.  Come back if you end up wanting to travel through us.

next.text: Japan is much more expensive than Taiwan.

2.text: Ah, yes.  Lots of people are migrating for work these days.  You can get your visa and papers done through the government office.  Our visa costs 1500.  Further costs are dependent on where you want to go.  The most common destinations are Taiwan and Japan.  Taiwan costs 1500 and Japan costs 3000.

3.text: There are more rules about traveling to Japan as a worker.  We'll have to evaluate your skills and education to make sure you met their requirements before you could get a visa to work there.  Taiwan has more lower-skilled positions, and less red tape for us.

4.text: Do you have any preference as to what industry you'd like to work in?

5.text: Right.   There are open positions in both Japan and Taiwan for those industries.

6.text: Right.   There are open positions in both Japan and Taiwan for those industries.

7.text: Right.   There are open positions in both Japan and Taiwan for those industries.

8.text: Right.  We'll find a spot for you somewhere, then.

next.text: No, I have to consult my spouse first.

9.text: Would you like to begin the visa process through the government center right now?
